issue.title: api.bilibili.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://api.bilibili.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.bilibili.com) ### Comment > I have set both rules "||*^app=tv.danmaku.bili,important" > and "||*.*^app=tv.danmaku.bili,important" in the custom rule list. However, the Adguard filter can not block all of them. > Username: `@lianghdx` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/aorrkqinlr4gogswcsg8kk808ogkcc8or2c33nlkfk.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/irtuc26myw8occ884g44sccw4g4kkgw42vrso90k5g.png?nc=1)

Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Disable cache for third-party requests,
Block third-party Authorization header

**Browser API**:
Block WebRTC,
Block Push API,
Block Location API

**Miscellaneous**:
Hide your Referrer from third-parties (Default),
Hide your IP address (47.92.68.26),
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Protect against DPI DNS filtering: | server: `https://223.5.5.5/dns-query`, `https://223.6.6.6/dns-query`, `https://1.12.12.12/dns-query`, `https://120.53.53.53/dns-query`
Filters: | Ad blocking:

issue.title: www.nzherald.co.nz
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.nzherald.co.nz/lifestyle/easter-trading-rules-2025-store-closures-and-exemptions-explained/4LCVYHOYOZG3RH6ZTY7N7H3X24/#google_vignette](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nzherald.co.nz%2Flifestyle%2Feaster-trading-rules-2025-store-closures-and-exemptions-explained%2F4LCVYHOYOZG3RH6ZTY7N7H3X24%2F%23google_vignette) ### Comment > This reporting system is an absolute joke. Just trake the URL and look for yourselves - it's clear to see where the ads are ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/26mhnn9wrscgwko8og0oo004k8s00go33seo03mpt2.jpg?nc=1)
